quote: Never be afraid to reach for the stars because even if you fall, you'll always be wearing a Parent-chute™.

We like to think we are so smart, and we have all the answers. And we want to pass all that on to our children, but if you scratch beneath the surface you don’t have to dig very deep to find the kid you were. Which is kind of crazy that now we’re raising kids of our own. I guess that’s the real circle of life.
